page.title: 05POPULATION MOVEMENT IN SHAW
page.content:
Many new houses have been built in the area around Crompton Buckstones C.P. School in recent years.The children in Class 3 decided to find out how many of their parents and grandparents had actually been born in Shaw and the reasons why people had decided to move house.They sent out questionnaires to all the families with children in school and interviewed some of the parents and grandparents. { {The Questionnaire}
We found out that most people were born outside Shaw.Some of the people were born overseas in places like France,India and Africa. Most people have lived in Shaw less than 10 years.It is mainly grandparents who have lived in Shaw more than 20 years.
